name: Multiverse Madness!
description:
What Is This Game!?

Trapped in a science lab travelling through the multiverse. And what's worse, being chased by mutant bats! Your only option...run and dodge back to your own universe!

Multiverse Madness! is an infinite runner game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #13. Dodge the enemies coming at you and try to survive as long as possible.

Controls:
  • Up arrow: Jump
  • Down arrow: Slide
Credits:
  • Code: freddster1018
  • Art: freddster1018
  • Music: Stage 3 by sawsquarenoise
  • SFX: https://sfxr.me/
  • Font: VCR OSD Mono by Riciery Leal

Have fun!!!
